card_1.cardText:
> _“It taught me about the importance of prayer. It taught me the importance of surrendering to God, surrendering your fears to Him, and just knowing that whatever happens, whether it’s going to be a bad outcome or a good outcome, He is going to be there to help you get through it.”_

Kristen Masciantonio

card_10.cardText:
Kristen's daughter, Gianna was born with a deadly brain stem tumor. Given nearly no chance at survival, Gianna defied all odds. As Kristen describes in this week's podcast, a miraculous chain of events led to this outcome. Listen:

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-09-23-qtd/)
